name: Soccer Mania 2015
description:
Here we presenting you the most exciting Soccer Championship game of 2015. This time we brought for you very real team players and smooth realistic 3D graphics. It also have very amazing sound effect of crowed and game play is very amazing. World Top 10 teams are included with their costumes and flags. You total goals and win matches are tracked and you can show you score to your friends.
How to Play:
You can control your player with joystick controller on the left side.
You can pass your ball to nearest player by pressing Pass button
You can kick the ball in the net by pressing the Shoot button
If You want to kick the ball harder then you need to press the shoot button for a longer period of time the release it.

Game Features:
HD Graphics
HD Soccer Players
HD Soccer Stadium
Top 10 World champion teams
Leader Board of Goals and Trophies

Teams:
• Germany • Argentina • Uruguay
• Brazil • Spain • France
• Portugal • Italy • US
• England • Turkey • Indonesia
